title: How to get a grant (Full LineCheck episode)
description:
Minnesotan organizations and government entities provide millions of dollars in arts funding every year. But how do you actually take advantage of those opportunities?

Andy Sturdevant from Springboard for the Arts, Joanna Schnedler from the Minnesota Music Coalition, and grant-winning musician PaviElle tell Diane about their favorite ways to find and win grants. Plus, Minnesota musician Moise offers two acoustic songs.

You rely on The Current to keep you connected to the music you love, and we rely on you to power this station. Everything you find here is only possible because of listener support. Give now at: http://www.support.mpr.org/youtube

title: Poliça – Rotting (live at The Current)
description:
Minneapolis art-pop band Poliça’s new record, "Madness," takes them a step forward into the creative realm with producer Ryan Olson’s new anthropomorphic production tool AllOvers. Watch Poliça perform the track "Rotting" from the new album.

Host – Diane
Guest –Poliça 
Technical director – Evan Clark 
Producer – Jesse Wiza 
Digital producer – Luke Taylor

This activity is made possible in part by the Minnesota Legacy Amendment's Arts & Cultural Heritage Fund.

title: Beabadoobee - Talk (Live at Rock The Garden 2022)
description:
Beabadoobee performed live at Rock the Garden in Minneapolis on June 11, 2022, and her set included tracks from her new album, "Beatopia," released July 15. Watch Beabadoobee and her band perform "Talk" from "Beatopia," from their set recorded live at Rock the Garden. 

Personnel
Beabadoobee – vocals, guitar
Eliana Sewell – bass
Jacob Bugden – lead guitar
Luca Caruso – drums

title: Craig Finn – Birthdays (Live at The Current)
description:
After releasing "A Legacy of Rentals" — his fifth solo album — in May of this year, Craig Finn is now on tour in support of the record. Watch Craig Finn and the Uptown Controllers perform "Birthdays" from the new album. 

Personnel
Craig Finn – vocals
Paul “Falcon" Valdez – drums
Patrick Doyle – guitar
Joseph Faught – bass
Nelson Devereaux – saxophone

Credits
Host – Ayisha Jaffer
Guest – Craig Finn 
Technical director – Evan Clark
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Digital producer – Luke Taylor
